page.title: 11FARMING, SHEEP & CATTLE
page.content: {YEW FARM}(259128) & {WHITE CROSS } {FARM}(257129) are owned by Saville Estates and tenanted by Frank & David Gill whose family have farmed there for more than a century. Total acreage is 207 acres of which 137 is grass; 42 is barley; 12 wheat; 6 swedes; 2 mangolds and 1 acre potatoes. {ALL CROPS GROWN ARE MAINLY {USED FOR FEEDING LIVESTOCK.}The soil is deficient in copper and extra proteins and mineral additives are given to livestock. {LIVESTOCK} 200 cattle -fattened up,sold for beef. 7 sow pigs - sold for pork. 100 ewes (female sheep). 166 lambs. 3 rams (males) A few geese, ducks & hens are kept. There are 5 sheep dogs. {Cont'd Pg 12 { }
